original: med na mi 'byung ba la khyab pa'i phyogs kyi chos rnam pa gsum kho na dang / phyogs kyi chos nges pa rnam pa gsum ste /🔽med na mi 'byung bar @187a * //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba la khyab pa'i phyogs kyi chos rnam pa gsum kho na dang / phyogs kyi chos nges pa rnam pa gsum ste / med na mi 'byung bar @187a * //
translated: The property of the subject that pervades the absence of existence has just three modes.

original: nges pa'i phyogs kyi chos nges par rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid phyogs kyi chos tha dad pa rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: nges pa'i phyogs kyi chos nges par rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid phyogs kyi chos tha dad pa rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The property of the subject that is ascertained as necessarily nonexistent has just three different types of properties of the subject that are nature, effect, and nonobservation.

original: de'i chas khyab pa ma yin pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin te 'bras bu dang / rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid rnam pa gsum la phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa kho na yin pa'i phyir de ni gtan tshigs med pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa ma yin pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin te 'bras bu dang / rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid rnam pa gsum la phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa kho na yin pa'i phyir de ni gtan tshigs med pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: The pervasion by that part is not the reason, because the property of the subject in the three types of reason—effect, nature, and nonobservation—is pervasion by that part alone. Therefore, it has already been explained that it is not the case that there is no reason.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum las phyi rol tu 'gyur ba la med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad du byed pa gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum la med na mi 'byung ba gdon mi za bar yod pas de gtan tshigs ma🔽yin par brjod pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum las phyi rol tu 'gyur ba la med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad du byed pa gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum la med na mi 'byung ba gdon mi za bar yod pas de gtan tshigs ma yin par brjod pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, because there is no pervasion by that part in anything that is external to the three types of reason, the application of the term reason to that which lacks the relation of invariable concomitance is refuted, since invariable concomitance definitely exists in the three types of reason.🔽Even so, when this characteristic of the reason is stated,

original: de lta na yang de ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang mtshan nyid 'di brjod na /
analyzed: de lta na yang de ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang mtshan nyid 'di brjod na /
translated: it is as if it were a fallacious reason.

original: de la slob ma rnams gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad ldog par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
analyzed: de la slob ma rnams gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad ldog par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
translated: Thinking that the students will be confused about the term reason,

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang de las gzhan /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang de las gzhan /
translated: the master states, “A fallacious reason is something other than that.”

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Thus it is said.🔽🔽

original: de bas na phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa ni zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la gzhan pa de dag ni mtshan nyid ma tshang ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa ni zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la gzhan pa de dag ni mtshan nyid ma tshang ba'o //
translated: Thus, the definition of a reason is “the property of the subject that is pervaded by a part of it.” The others are incomplete definitions.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i mtshan nyid ma brjod do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba gi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i mtshan nyid ma brjod do //
translated: Thinking that they are fallacious reasons, their definitions are not stated.

original: 'di ltar phyogs chos zhes brjod pas gang la phyogs chos med de gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs chos zhes brjod pas gang la phyogs chos med de gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: Thus, by stating “the property of the subject,” it is understood that whatever does not have the property of the subject is not a reason.

original: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba brjod pas gang la de'i chas khyab pa dang bral ba'i khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa phyin ci log pa'o //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba brjod pas gang la de'i chas khyab pa dang bral ba'i khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa phyin ci log pa'o //
translated: By stating “pervasion by a part of it,” it is understood that the pervasion and the pervaded are reversed, where there is no pervasion by a part of it.

original: de la yod pa dang med pa de'i gtan tshigs kyi tshul ma tshang ba ni ma grub pa'am gal ba 'am ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar go bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la yod pa dang med pa de'i gtan tshigs kyi tshul ma tshang ba ni ma grub pa'am gal ba 'am ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar go bar bya'o //
translated: The incompleteness of the mode of the reason in terms of existence and nonexistence should be understood as the fallacious reasons of nonestablishment, over-pervasion, and inconclusiveness.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid gang gi don gang yin slob ma la bstan pas de'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba la de'i tha dad rnam la rang nyid 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid gang gi don gang yin slob ma la bstan pas de'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba la de'i tha dad rnam la rang nyid 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, since the disciple is taught the meaning of the characteristic, he does not engage in the differentiation of that which is devoid of the characteristic.

original: de ma yin pa'i ngo bo yongs su spangs nas de'i ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir de ni 'bad pa med pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i ngo bo yongs su spangs nas de'i ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir de ni 'bad pa med pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: And, since he understands the nature of that which is not that nature, having abandoned it, he possesses the fruit of non-effort.

original: gzhan du gtan tshigs ltar snang ba bstan pa gang yin pa de blo dman pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du gtan tshigs ltar snang ba bstan pa gang yin pa de blo dman pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, the teaching of the fallacious reason is for the sake of those of inferior intellect.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di ni blo rgya che ba rnams la bstan na mdzes te mdor bsdus nas brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di ni blo rgya che ba rnams la bstan na mdzes te mdor bsdus nas brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This chapter is beautiful when taught to those of vast intellect, because it is expressed in a concise form.

original: de nyid ni mdor bsdus nas ji lta bar bshad pa bzhin du rtogs par nus pas blo dman pa dag ni @187b ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni mdor bsdus nas ji lta bar bshad pa bzhin du rtogs par nus pas blo dman pa dag ni @187b ma yin te /
translated: And, since it is possible to understand it just as it is, in brief, it is not for those of inferior intellect,

original: de dag ni rgyas par brjod pa las gzhan pa ji lta ba bzhin du don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyas par brjod pa las gzhan pa ji lta ba bzhin du don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not understand the meaning just as it is, apart from the extensive explanation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na don gyis 'phangs pa'i nye bar bkod pa snga ma kho na bzhin du gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid dang de la nye bar brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na don gyis 'phangs pa'i nye bar bkod pa snga ma kho na bzhin du gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid dang de la nye bar brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the definition of a fallacious reason and its classification are just as they were previously implied by the meaning of the verse.

original: de ni 'dir gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang grangs nges pa dang de ni gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum du nges pas bzung bar bshad do //
analyzed: de ni 'dir gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang grangs nges pa dang de ni gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum du nges pas bzung bar bshad do //
translated: Here, the definition of a reason and its definite number are explained as being subsumed by the three types of reason.

original: de ni gnyi ga'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga dang 'brel bar bshad pa dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid shugs kyis bshad pas /
analyzed: de ni gnyi ga'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga dang 'brel bar bshad pa dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid shugs kyis bshad pas /
translated: Since it is the cause of both, it is explained as being related to both, and since the definition of a fallacious reason is implicitly explained,

original: rjod par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no snyam nas tshigs su bcad pa'i don rnam pa drug tu rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no snyam nas tshigs su bcad pa'i don rnam pa drug tu rgyas par bshad do //
translated: it is not the reason for the expression. Thus, the meaning of the verse is explained extensively in six topics.

original: gzhan yang 'di dag kyang legs par mthong ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di dag kyang legs par mthong ste /
translated: Moreover, these are also well seen:

original: rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam gsum nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The three types

original: rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu dang / mi dmigs pa tha dad pa gtan tshigs de ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu dang / mi dmigs pa tha dad pa gtan tshigs de ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: are the different types of reasons: nature, effect, and non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin du rnam gsum nyid ni phyogs kyi chos dang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo tha dad pa rnam pa gsum ni tshul gsum kho na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam gsum nyid ni phyogs kyi chos dang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo tha dad pa rnam pa gsum ni tshul gsum kho na'o //
translated: Likewise, the three modes are the three different aspects of the property of the position, positive concomitance, and negative concomitance.

original: de'i chas khyab ces brjod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag brjod do //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab ces brjod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag brjod do //
translated: The expression “pervasion by the mode” indicates positive and negative concomitance.

original: gnod pa med pa'i yul can la sogs pa'i tshul gzhan rung ba yin du zin kyang de ni gtan tshig ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i yul can la sogs pa'i tshul gzhan rung ba yin du zin kyang de ni gtan tshig ma yin no //
translated: Even though other modes, such as being non-deceptive, are possible, they are not the reason.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rang bzhin la sogs pa rnam pa gsum po de las sam phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa tshul gsum po dang 'brel pa las gzhan ni yang dag par ldan pa la sogs pa gzhan dang gnod pa med pa'i yul can
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rang bzhin la sogs pa rnam pa gsum po de las sam phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa tshul gsum po dang 'brel pa las gzhan ni yang dag par ldan pa la sogs pa gzhan dang gnod pa med pa'i yul can
translated: Because the reason is one of the three types of fallacious reasons, such as the one based on the nature of the subject, or because it is related to the three modes, such as the property of the position, and not to any other, such as being correct, or being non-deceptive,

original: la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i tshul dang ldan pa kho na'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i tshul dang ldan pa kho na'o //
translated: or being related to a mode that is different from those.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: Why is that?

original: med na mi 'byung ba rnam pa gsum yin /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba rnam pa gsum yin /
translated: Because the three types of non-observation are the three types of non-observation of the non-appearing.

original: rnam pa gsum kho na dang tshul gsum po kho na'i gtan tshigs nges pa gzhan la rang bzhin la sogs pa las tha dad pa dang tshul gzhan la rung ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum kho na dang tshul gsum po kho na'i gtan tshigs nges pa gzhan la rang bzhin la sogs pa las tha dad pa dang tshul gzhan la rung ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no other reason than the three modes alone, and that there is no other mode than the three modes alone.

original: rang bzhin la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan med na mi 'byung ba mi srid pa de bzhin du tshul gzhan yang med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan med na mi 'byung ba mi srid pa de bzhin du tshul gzhan yang med do //
translated: Just as there is no invariable relation without a distinct reason such as svabhāva, there is no other mode.

original: ji ltar med na mi 'byung ba'i tshul gzhan yang srid pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba de ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa drug la sogs pa'i skabs su phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'o //🔽gal te phyogs @188a * //
analyzed: ji ltar med na mi 'byung ba'i tshul gzhan yang srid pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba de ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa drug la sogs pa'i skabs su phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'o // gal te phyogs @188a * //
translated: How is it that there is no other mode? It is possible that there is only one mode of invariable relation. Thus, in the context of the six characteristics, etc., the term “property of the subject” is considered in terms of the definition of a reason.

original: spyi yin par nye bar bzung na ni gang rjes su dpag pa'i yul thams cad la gtan tshigs ma grub par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: spyi yin par nye bar bzung na ni gang rjes su dpag pa'i yul thams cad la gtan tshigs ma grub par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If one takes the subject in general, then any reason would be unestablished with respect to all objects of inference.

original: grub na ni rjes su dpag pa don med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: grub na ni rjes su dpag pa don med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is established, then the inference is pointless.

original: phyogs ni chos can no zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: phyogs ni chos can no zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The term “subject” is a “position.”

original: gal te spyi'i tshig yin na ji ltar phyogs kyi sgra chos tsam la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i tshig yin na ji ltar phyogs kyi sgra chos tsam la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is a general term, how can the term “position” apply to the mere property?

original: yan lag la spyir nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag la spyir nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the term “position” is figuratively applied to a part.

original: phyogs kyi sgra ni chos dang / chos can yan lag gnyi ga'i spyi yin te de ni 'dir chos can tsam la spyir nye bar btags nas phyogs kyi sgra 'jug pa'i phyir ro //🔽de'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis spyir nye bar btags pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgra ni chos dang / chos can yan lag gnyi ga'i spyi yin te de ni 'dir chos can tsam la spyir nye bar btags nas phyogs kyi sgra 'jug pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis spyir nye bar btags pa'i phyir /
translated: The term “position” is a general term for both the property and the subject, the part. Here, the term “position” is applied figuratively to the mere subject.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las gzhan pa de thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can las gzhan pa de thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the term “position” is figuratively applied to a part, it does not follow that the subject of the probandum is other than the mere property.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: spyi don bsgrub bya nyid yin pas //
analyzed: spyi don bsgrub bya nyid yin pas //
translated: Because the general meaning is the probandum,

original: chos tsam yang na chos can la //🔽gtso bo min yang nye bar btags //
analyzed: chos tsam yang na chos can la // gtso bo min yang nye bar btags //
translated: the mere property or the subject🔽is figuratively called the position,

original: bsgrub bya'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a part of the probandum.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is what he says.

original: de 'dir slob dpon gyis bshad pa la /
analyzed: de 'dir slob dpon gyis bshad pa la /
translated: Here, the master Buddhapālita explains🔽the response that refutes Īśvarasena.

original: dbang phyug sde spong ba'i lan btab par 'dod pas phyogs snga ma ni /🔽gal te dgos pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dbang phyug sde spong ba'i lan btab par 'dod pas phyogs snga ma ni / gal te dgos pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: The opponent’s position is stated in the lines:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “Because it is purposeless” and so on.

original: dgos pa med na dngos kyi sgra'i don khyad du gsad par mi 'dod pa'i phyir dgos pa med pas nye bar gdags par mi rigs so //
analyzed: dgos pa med na dngos kyi sgra'i don khyad du gsad par mi 'dod pa'i phyir dgos pa med pas nye bar gdags par mi rigs so //
translated: If it is purposeless, then because it is not asserted that the meaning of the actual words is to be disregarded, it is not tenable that it is designated because it is purposeless.

original: de'i phyir chos can gyi chos yin ba blo'i snyam du gzhan sems na /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can gyi chos yin ba blo'i snyam du gzhan sems na /
translated: Therefore, if you think that the property of the subject is the object of the mind,

original: dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: then it is not purposeless.

original: gang las she na thams cad ni rtsod pa'i gzhi 'am gzhan pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: gang las she na thams cad ni rtsod pa'i gzhi 'am gzhan pa'i chos can no //
translated: From what? Everything is the basis of the debate or the subject of another.

original: de'i chos de dgag pa'i don du nye bar btags pa'i dgos pa de yang yod pa de'i phyir nye bar btags pa ni chos can thams cad kyi chos dgag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dgos pa med pa ma yin pas gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i chos de dgag pa'i don du nye bar btags pa'i dgos pa de yang yod pa de'i phyir nye bar btags pa ni chos can thams cad kyi chos dgag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dgos pa med pa ma yin pas gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
translated: The purpose of the designation is for the purpose of refuting its property. That purpose exists. Therefore, because the designation is not purposeless, the reason is not established.

original: gal te de ltar yon tan ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yon tan ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked what kind of good quality is that,

original: de lta na mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin na pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta na mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin na pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, “In that case, because it is the object of apprehension of the eye, etc.”

original: khva'i nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni gzhi tha dad pas ma grub pa yin /
analyzed: khva'i nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni gzhi tha dad pas ma grub pa yin /
translated: The statement “black of the crow,” etc., is an unestablished reason due to the difference of basis.

original: yongs su spangs pa ni gtan tshigs kyis bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: yongs su spangs pa ni gtan tshigs kyis bsal ba yin no //
translated: “Completely abandoned” is the refutation by the reason.

original: chos can gyi chos zhes thung mong du brjod pa de dag gis kyang de gtan tshigs su 'gyur bas chos can smos pas kyang de grub pas nye bar btags su med do //
analyzed: chos can gyi chos zhes thung mong du brjod pa de dag gis kyang de gtan tshigs su 'gyur bas chos can smos pas kyang de grub pas nye bar btags su med do //
translated: Those that are stated in common as the property of the subject are also the reason, so the subject is also established by the statement of the subject, and it is not necessary to add it.

original: de'i phyir nye bar @188b btags pa kho na don med do snyam nas gzhan gyis /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar @188b btags pa kho na don med do snyam nas gzhan gyis /
translated: Therefore, it is thought that the addition is meaningless.

original: chos brjod pas kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: chos brjod pas kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The other says, “Also, by stating the property.”

original: chos can 'ba' zhig brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can 'ba' zhig brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not only the subject that is stated,

original: chos can yin par gzhi ltar grub ste gzhi chos can yin pas gzhi smos pa de grub pa de las yin no //
analyzed: chos can yin par gzhi ltar grub ste gzhi chos can yin pas gzhi smos pa de grub pa de las yin no //
translated: but the subject is established as the basis of the property, because the basis is the subject. The statement of the basis is established from that.

original: gal te yang chos ni chos gzhan la brten pa'i rgyu mtshan ci zhig yin ce na /
analyzed: gal te yang chos ni chos gzhan la brten pa'i rgyu mtshan ci zhig yin ce na /
translated: If you ask, “What is the reason that a property is dependent on another property?”

original: chos ni gzhan la brten pa yin pas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: chos ni gzhan la brten pa yin pas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “Because a property is dependent on another.”

original: gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar 'dis chos can 'phangs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar 'dis chos can 'phangs pa yin no //
translated: Since it is dependent on another, it is necessarily implied by the property possessor.

original: de'i phyir chos can lhag par brjod pas bsgrub pa bya ba'i chos can kho na bye brag tu bstan pas gang yang rung ba ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can lhag par brjod pas bsgrub pa bya ba'i chos can kho na bye brag tu bstan pas gang yang rung ba ni ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, because the property possessor is stated in excess, only the property possessor that is the object of the proposition is indicated, not just any property possessor.

original: / chos can smos pas mngon par 'dod pa'i khyad par can gyi chos can 'ba' zhig rtogs pa de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yin no snyam du 'dod pas ga las she na /
analyzed: / chos can smos pas mngon par 'dod pa'i khyad par can gyi chos can 'ba' zhig rtogs pa de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yin no snyam du 'dod pas ga las she na /
translated: If you ask, “Why is it that the property possessor that is the object of the proposition is understood to be the property possessor that is qualified by the property that is explicitly stated in the proof statement?”

original: nye ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i grags pa smos te /
analyzed: nye ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i grags pa smos te /
translated: He says, “Because it is proximate.”

original: nye ba yang chos can brjod pas mngon par 'dod pa kho nar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba yang chos can brjod pas mngon par 'dod pa kho nar rig par bya'o //
translated: Proximate should be understood as the property possessor that is explicitly stated.

original: chos can brjod pa yang chos can tsam 'phangs pa khyab pa'i rigs pa yin na ni /
analyzed: chos can brjod pa yang chos can tsam 'phangs pa khyab pa'i rigs pa yin na ni /
translated: If the subject is mentioned in order to impel the mere subject, then the subject is mentioned by the reasoning of pervasion.

original: chos can brjod pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can brjod pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mention of the subject is meaningless.

original: nye bar gyur pa 'di bsgrub pa bya ba'i chos can yin te /
analyzed: nye bar gyur pa 'di bsgrub pa bya ba'i chos can yin te /
translated: This proximate [subject] is the subject to be established,

original: de la thog mar gtan tshigs bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la thog mar gtan tshigs bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is taught first in that [proximate subject].

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nye bar brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can nye bar brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: If the subject to be established is not mentioned,

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: why is that?

original: dpe'i chos can yang yin te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can 'ba' zhig nye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe'i chos can yang yin te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can 'ba' zhig nye ba ma yin te /
translated: The example subject is also [not mentioned], because the subject to be established is not the only proximate [subject].

original: res 'ga' khyab pa bstan pa sngon du 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba la dpe'i chos can la yang thog mar gtan tshigs yod par ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' khyab pa bstan pa sngon du 'gro ba'i gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba la dpe'i chos can la yang thog mar gtan tshigs yod par ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sometimes, in the statement of the pervasion, the application of the reason is preceded by the example subject, because the existence of the reason is first shown in the example subject.

original: gal te nye bar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can du ma grub pa de ltar yongs su lhag pa las yin te /
analyzed: gal te nye bar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can du ma grub pa de ltar yongs su lhag pa las yin te /
translated: If the subject to be established is not established, then it is like that because of the remainder.

original: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs de'i chas khyab pa ni dpe'i chos can la yod par grub pas dpe med na gtan tshigs dang bsgrub par bya ba'i khyab pa bstan par mi nus so snyam du bsams nas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs de'i chas khyab pa ni dpe'i chos can la yod par grub pas dpe med na gtan tshigs dang bsgrub par bya ba'i khyab pa bstan par mi nus so snyam du bsams nas /
translated: Because the pervasion by a part of the reason is established to exist in the example subject, if there were no example, one would be unable to demonstrate the pervasion of the reason by the probandum.

original: chos can lhag par smos pa des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: chos can lhag par smos pa des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: Therefore, since the subject is mentioned, the subject of the probandum is completely included.

original: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba kyang de'i sgra ni brjod pa la ltos nas chos can dang 'brel pa'i phyir de'i 'brel pa'i don kyang chos can smos par dgos par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba kyang de'i sgra ni brjod pa la ltos nas chos can dang 'brel pa'i phyir de'i 'brel pa'i don kyang chos can smos par dgos par mi bya'o //
translated: As for the phrase “pervasion by a part of that,” the word “that” is related to the subject in dependence on the expression, so the meaning of the relation to that is not to be taken as the necessity of mentioning the subject.

original: gang la dgos pa med na mi 'byung ba @189a * //
analyzed: gang la dgos pa med na mi 'byung ba @189a * //
translated: That which does not occur without necessity

original: de ni yongs su lhag pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: de ni yongs su lhag pa'i yul yin te /
translated: is the completely remaining object.

original: chos can brjod pa dang dgos pa gzhan dang 'brel pa yin na ni /
analyzed: chos can brjod pa dang dgos pa gzhan dang 'brel pa yin na ni /
translated: If the expression of the subject is related to another necessity,🔽then

original: de yongs su lhag pa ga la yin chos can brjod pas ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su bzung ngo snyam du sems na grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: de yongs su lhag pa ga la yin chos can brjod pas ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su bzung ngo snyam du sems na grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: How could that be a remainder? If you think that by stating the subject, the subject of the probandum is apprehended, then the proponent of the conclusion

original: grub kyang zhes bya ba smos te /🔽de'i chas khyab pa dpe'i chos can la yod pa la yang chos can brjod pas dpe'i chos can kho na'i chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes bsnan pa'i don du dogs pa des na mig gis bzung ba la sogs pa kho na yang gtan tshigs
analyzed: grub kyang zhes bya ba smos te / de'i chas khyab pa dpe'i chos can la yod pa la yang chos can brjod pas dpe'i chos can kho na'i chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes bsnan pa'i don du dogs pa des na mig gis bzung ba la sogs pa kho na yang gtan tshigs
translated: says, “Even if established,”🔽fearing that the meaning of the addition would be that the reason is only the property of the example’s subject, since the pervasion by that property exists in the example’s subject, and the example’s subject is stated.

original: su 'gyur gyi byas pa la sogs pa ma yin pas mi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur ba de'i phyir nye bar btags par byas so //
analyzed: su 'gyur gyi byas pa la sogs pa ma yin pas mi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur ba de'i phyir nye bar btags par byas so //
translated: Therefore, only that which is apprehended by the eye and so on would be the reason, but not that which is produced and so on. Thus, it would not be accepted. Therefore, it is imputed.

original: ci rtog ge'i bstan bcos la bsnan pa'i phyir brjod pa mthong ngam zhe na /
analyzed: ci rtog ge'i bstan bcos la bsnan pa'i phyir brjod pa mthong ngam zhe na /
translated: Do you state this in order to add to the treatise of logic?

original: mthun pa la yod pa kho nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mthun pa la yod pa kho nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “Only that which exists in the similar class,” and so on.

original: de la yang mthun pa la yo pa zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de la yang mthun pa la yo pa zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: In this regard, the definition of a reason is “that which exists only in what is similar.”

original: rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba nges par gzung bas gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa grub mod /
analyzed: rigs mthun pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba nges par gzung bas gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa grub mod /
translated: By the specification “only in what is similar,” the contraposition of the reason is established.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: But with respect to what?

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa'o //
translated: With respect to the absence of the probandum.

original: gang 'di med pa de ni 'di yin no zhes ba bas med pa med par smos pa ni bsnan pa'i don du slob dpon gyis /🔽med pa la med pa zhes bya ba bshad pas ji lta ba med na ni gzhan pa dang 'gal ba la ma yin pa bzhin du /
analyzed: gang 'di med pa de ni 'di yin no zhes ba bas med pa med par smos pa ni bsnan pa'i don du slob dpon gyis / med pa la med pa zhes bya ba bshad pas ji lta ba med na ni gzhan pa dang 'gal ba la ma yin pa bzhin du /
translated: The master [Dignāga] explains that the statement “absence of that which is absent” is for the purpose of addition.

original: de lta na 'dir yang chos can gyi chos zhes brjod pas bsnan pa'i don du dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na 'dir yang chos can gyi chos zhes brjod pas bsnan pa'i don du dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as “absence of non-existence” is explained as “existence,” so too, in this case, “property of the subject” is expressed for the purpose of addition.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: But with respect to what?

original: dpe'i chos can la yod par grub kyang ngo //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can la yod par grub kyang ngo //
translated: With respect to the existence that is established as existing in the example.

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i chas khyab pa zhes smos pas so //
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa zhes smos pas so //
translated: Because it is said, “pervasion by a part of that.”

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: But with respect to what?

original: yod pa bsnan pa'i don yin pas so //
analyzed: yod pa bsnan pa'i don yin pas so //
translated: With respect to the existence that is for the purpose of addition.

original: de nyid la dpe'i chos can la yod par dogs pa srid do //
analyzed: de nyid la dpe'i chos can la yod par dogs pa srid do //
translated: In that case, it is possible to suspect that the example property-possessor has the probandum.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: yongs su lhag pas bsgrub pa bya ba'i chos can yongs su bzung ba na'o //
analyzed: yongs su lhag pas bsgrub pa bya ba'i chos can yongs su bzung ba na'o //
translated: When the property-possessor to be established is taken as the remainder.

original: 'o na ni phyogs kyi cho med na gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir bsnan pa'i don du dogs par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na ni phyogs kyi cho med na gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir bsnan pa'i don du dogs par mi bya ste /
translated: But if the property-possessor does not exist, then since there is no reason, it should not be suspected that it is for the sake of addition.

original: de lta na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyis khyab pa'i chos kyang gal te chos can kha cig la nye bar dmigs pa de dang de nyid la rang gi khyab par byed pa la rtog pa skye'o gzhan du na nye ba dang / ring pa'i rim pa blta bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyis khyab pa'i chos kyang gal te chos can kha cig la nye bar dmigs pa de dang de nyid la rang gi khyab par byed pa la rtog pa skye'o gzhan du na nye ba dang / ring pa'i rim pa blta bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, if the property that pervades the property-possessor to be established is observed in some property-possessor, then the conception of its pervader arises in regard to that very property-possessor. Otherwise, the sequence of near and far would not be observed.

original: chos can kha cig la mi @189b dmigs na ji ltar go bar byed pa yin de ltar yin na yang thams cad du rung gi khyab par byed pa rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos can kha cig la mi @189b dmigs na ji ltar go bar byed pa yin de ltar yin na yang thams cad du rung gi khyab par byed pa rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not observed in some property-possessor, how can it be a reason? Even if it is so, it would be suitable everywhere, but the pervader would not be understood.

original: nye ba dang ring ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: nye ba dang ring ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no near or far.

original: des na shugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: des na shugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Indirectly, etc.”

original: gal te 'di de ma thag tu shugs kyis nye bar brjod pa de'i phyir shugs kyi don ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi mtshan nyid yongs su bzung ba nyan pa po blo rnon pos rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'di de ma thag tu shugs kyis nye bar brjod pa de'i phyir shugs kyi don ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi mtshan nyid yongs su bzung ba nyan pa po blo rnon pos rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: If this is indirectly expressed, then the meaning of the indirect expression is the definition of the subject of the proposition to be established, which is understood by the listener of sharp intellect.🔽However, it is difficult to understand the meaning of the indirect expression by engaging in it oneself without words.

original: 'on kyang sgra med pa'i don la rang nyid rjes su zhugs nas rtogs par dka' bar 'gyur ba dang / de la nye bar btags pa tsam gyis rang nyid sgra med pa'i don la rtog pa na ;
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra med pa'i don la rang nyid rjes su zhugs nas rtogs par dka' bar 'gyur ba dang / de la nye bar btags pa tsam gyis rang nyid sgra med pa'i don la rtog pa na ;
translated: When one understands the meaning of the indirect expression by oneself, through mere designation of it,

original: chos can gyi chos zhes bya ba 'di dang phyogs chos zhes bya ba yi ge mnyam pa dang rtogs par dka' ba yang yongs su spangs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos can gyi chos zhes bya ba 'di dang phyogs chos zhes bya ba yi ge mnyam pa dang rtogs par dka' ba yang yongs su spangs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the so-called property of the subject and the so-called property of the subject are equal in syllables and easy to understand, and are also completely abandoned.

original: 'dir yang gi sgra ni gang gzhan gyis bstan pa la re ba dang bcas pa des na don 'di'i mtshan nyid brjod pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang gi sgra ni gang gzhan gyis bstan pa la re ba dang bcas pa des na don 'di'i mtshan nyid brjod pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the word “also” means that one who is dependent on what is taught by another will not understand the definition of this object.

original: ji ltar mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i phyogs kyi chos med pas gtan tshogs med na dogs pa 'di gang la yin snyam pas de'i phyir de dag mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams la bsnan pa'i don du dgos pa yongs su spang pa'i phyir yang nye bar btags🔽pa byas so //
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i phyogs kyi chos med pas gtan tshogs med na dogs pa 'di gang la yin snyam pas de'i phyir de dag mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams la bsnan pa'i don du dgos pa yongs su spang pa'i phyir yang nye bar btags pa byas so //
translated: Since the property of the subject is not established in the position of understanding the definition, how can there be doubt? Therefore, in order to eliminate the purpose of adding to those who follow the definition, it is also designated.

original: 'dir sgra'i sbyor ba la gdon mi za bar rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du nges par gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir sgra'i sbyor ba la gdon mi za bar rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du nges par gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Here, the application of the term must be ascertained as having the effect of exclusion.

original: phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba 'dir drug pa'i bsdu ba yin gyi /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba 'dir drug pa'i bsdu ba yin gyi /
translated: In this “property of the subject,” the sixth case is used,

original: gzhan gyi bsdu ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bsdu ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: but the other cases are not possible.

original: de lta na yang phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba kho nar nges pa bzung bas de'i chas khyab pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa na /
analyzed: de lta na yang phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba kho nar nges pa bzung bas de'i chas khyab pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa na /
translated: However, the definition of contradiction is stated as follows:🔽When the property of the subject is ascertained as just that, it contradicts pervasion by that part.

original: gal te phyogs chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te phyogs chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If the property of the subject is ascertained as just that, it contradicts pervasion by that part.

original: phyogs kyi khyad par gzhan rnam par gcod pa la ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs kyi khyad par gzhan rnam par gcod pa la ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it depends on the exclusion of other specific properties,

original: de'i khyad par la ltos pa'i cho ni gzhan la phyogs su byas pa dang gzhan gyi tshe'i mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su mi 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i khyad par la ltos pa'i cho ni gzhan la phyogs su byas pa dang gzhan gyi tshe'i mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su mi 'jug go //
translated: the property that depends on that distinction does not pervade other things that are taken as the subject or the similar instances of other subjects.

original: de ltar na phyogs kyis khyad par du bya ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs kho na yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs kyis khyad par du bya ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs kho na yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, that which is distinguished by the subject is only the similar instances, not others.

original: dper na lha sbyin gyi bu gang yin pa de kho na'i yin gyi /
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin gyi bu gang yin pa de kho na'i yin gyi /
translated: For example, it is just the son of Devadatta, not the son of Yajnadatta.

original: mchod sbyin gyi ma yin ba bzhin du des na gzhan la mi 'jug pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid du thun mong ba ni ma yin pas de'i @190a * //
analyzed: mchod sbyin gyi ma yin ba bzhin du des na gzhan la mi 'jug pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid du thun mong ba ni ma yin pas de'i @190a * //
translated: Thus, since it does not pervade other things, it is not common, or not shared.

original: chas khyab pa dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chas khyab pa dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “contradictory” is “pervaded by the opposite.”

original: de'i chas khyab pa ni bstan pa'i phyir thun mong ba yin pa des na phyogs kyi chos ni de'i chas khyab pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa ni bstan pa'i phyir thun mong ba yin pa des na phyogs kyi chos ni de'i chas khyab pa ma yin la /
translated: In order to demonstrate that pervasion, he says, “Because it is common to both.” Therefore, the property of the subject is not pervaded by that.

original: yang na de'i chas khyab pa ni phyogs kyi chos ma yin pas 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya'o //🔽'on kyang de'i chas khyab pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos khyab par byed pa de ni gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba gzhi chos can de la yod pa kho na'am /
analyzed: yang na de'i chas khyab pa ni phyogs kyi chos ma yin pas 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya'o // 'on kyang de'i chas khyab pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos khyab par byed pa de ni gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba gzhi chos can de la yod pa kho na'am /
translated: Or, because that is not pervaded by the property of the subject, it is the definition of a contradictory reason.🔽However, the pervasion by that is the property of the subject that pervades the probandum. That is only present in the subject, the basis of the argument, which is the definition of an inconclusive reason.🔽Or, the probandum that is pervaded by the reason is only present in that which is pervaded by the reason. That is the definition of an inconclusive reason. The definition of an inconclusive reason is that it is not a pervasion.

original: yang na khyab par bya ba'i gtan tshigs de nyid ni khyab par byed pa bsgrub bya'i chos su gyur pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba rang gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na khyab par bya ba'i gtan tshigs de nyid ni khyab par byed pa bsgrub bya'i chos su gyur pa kho na la yod pa zhes bya ba rang gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, the pervasion by that is the property of the subject that pervades the probandum. That is only present in the subject, the basis of the argument, which is the definition of an inconclusive reason.🔽Or, the probandum that is pervaded by the reason is only present in that which is pervaded by the reason. That is the definition of an inconclusive reason. The definition of an inconclusive reason is that it is not a pervasion.

original: 'dis kyang phyogs su byas pas gzhan la 'jug pa gdon mi za bar 'phangs pa ni med na gang gi mtshan nyid la gnod par dogs pa yin /
analyzed: 'dis kyang phyogs su byas pas gzhan la 'jug pa gdon mi za bar 'phangs pa ni med na gang gi mtshan nyid la gnod par dogs pa yin /
translated: But if it is not so, then it is not necessarily implied that it is present in other cases.  And if it is not so, then there is the danger of invalidating the definition.

original: de lta na phyogs su byas pa de nyid la yod pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la gtan tshigs gnas pa don de'i chas khyab pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na phyogs su byas pa de nyid la yod pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la gtan tshigs gnas pa don de'i chas khyab pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, when it is made a party to the proof, it is the presence of the reason in the subject of the proposition that is taught, and the pervasion by the part of the object.🔽  And that is the reason why it is understood that it is present only in the subject of the proposition, and not in the subject of the counter-proposition.

original: gang zhig de'i chos can la rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med na mi 'byung ba de nyid go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi chos can de la yang rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med na mi 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan ni sgrub par
analyzed: gang zhig de'i chos can la rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med na mi 'byung ba de nyid go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi chos can de la yang rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med na mi 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan ni sgrub par
translated: Therefore, when the reason is present in the subject of the proposition, it is not the reason for proving the same thing in the subject of the counter-proposition.

original: byed pa'i tshad ma'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa'i tshad ma'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: For, in the latter case, the reason is not the ground for the valid cognition that proves the same thing.

original: la lar mthun pa'i phyogs phal che ba 'am lhan cig yod pa tsam mthong ba rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: la lar mthun pa'i phyogs phal che ba 'am lhan cig yod pa tsam mthong ba rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: In some cases, the mere observation of the presence of the reason in a similar instance or in many similar instances is not the ground.

original: dper na rdo rje la mtshon gyis gcod pa yin te sa yin pa'i phyir shing bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan la mtshon gyis gcod pa med na mi 'byung ba yang rdo rje la de bzhin du yod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na rdo rje la mtshon gyis gcod pa yin te sa yin pa'i phyir shing bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan la mtshon gyis gcod pa med na mi 'byung ba yang rdo rje la de bzhin du yod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying, “A vajra is cut by a diamond, because it is earth, like wood.”

original: gal te phyogs su byas pa las gzhan kho na la khyab pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa de ji ltar yin /
analyzed: gal te phyogs su byas pa las gzhan kho na la khyab pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa de ji ltar yin /
translated: If it is definite that the pervasion must be stated in relation to something other than the subject, then how is that?

original: yod pa nyid skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la bstan pa gang yin pa ni don thams cad pa nyid skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la bstan pa gang yin pa skad cig mas khyab par 'dod pas de las 'ga' zhig kyang mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur ba
analyzed: yod pa nyid skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la bstan pa gang yin pa ni don thams cad pa nyid skad cig ma'i dngos po rnams la bstan pa gang yin pa skad cig mas khyab par 'dod pas de las 'ga' zhig kyang mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur ba
translated: Whatever is existence is stated in relation to momentary things, and whatever is pervasion is stated in relation to momentary things, because it is asserted that pervasion is momentary. Therefore, there is nothing that is a concordant example.

original: med do / gang zhig me lci 'bar ba la sogs pa 'ba' zhig la skad cig ma khas blangs su zin kyang de yang mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: med do / gang zhig me lci 'bar ba la sogs pa 'ba' zhig la skad cig ma khas blangs su zin kyang de yang mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: Even if one accepts that only blazing fire and so on are momentary, that is not established by direct perception.

original: skad cig ma'i tha dad par gyu pa ni shin tu phra bas nye bar mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i tha dad par gyu pa ni shin tu phra bas nye bar mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the difference of the momentary is very subtle, it is not perceived.

original: gzhan kho na la khyab pa ma bstan par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa 'di ci zhig yin //
analyzed: gzhan kho na la khyab pa ma bstan par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa 'di ci zhig yin //
translated: What is the logic of this? That the pervasion is not taught with respect to another, but with respect to the subject of the probandum?

original: @190b de lta na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa brtag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: @190b de lta na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa brtag pa yin gyi /
translated: In that case, the definition of the reason is a fiction,

original: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa ma yin no //
translated: not a matter of the power of fact.

original: de'i phyir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa las kyang gtan tshigs la khyab pa 'grub ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa las kyang gtan tshigs la khyab pa 'grub ste /
translated: Therefore, the pervasion of the reason is established by its relation to its own probandum,

original: de yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la yang 'grub pa'i phyir gzhan la rjes su 'brang ba la cung zad kyang ltos pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la yang 'grub pa'i phyir gzhan la rjes su 'brang ba la cung zad kyang ltos pa ma yin pas so //
translated: and that is established with respect to the subject of the probandum, if there is a valid cognition that rules out the discordant side. It does not depend in the slightest on following another.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: gzhan du gang dang gang la 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba de'i 'brel par rig pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan du gang dang gang la 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba de'i 'brel par rig pa ni /
translated: it is known that whatever is seen somewhere is related to that.

original: de dang de ni de la go bar byed pa yin no zhes dngos po go bar byed pa mtshungs te /
analyzed: de dang de ni de la go bar byed pa yin no zhes dngos po go bar byed pa mtshungs te /
translated: and that is the reason why it is similar to the probans.🔽And again, the definition of the probans is given in the words:

original: gang yang rjes su dpag pa dang // de mtshungs la yang yod gyur pa //
analyzed: gang yang rjes su dpag pa dang // de mtshungs la yang yod gyur pa //
translated: “That which is present in the object to be inferred and in that which is similar to it,🔽but not present in the contrary of that object, is the probans.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa ni /🔽mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni de la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang ldan pa ni / mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod do //
translated: Now, that which possesses the property to be established is called the similar instance.🔽Therefore, existence is the property to be established.

original: des na yod pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yod pa yin no zhes bya ba de bzhin du de dang de'i chos kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dngos po las ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na yod pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yod pa yin no zhes bya ba de bzhin du de dang de'i chos kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dngos po las ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the subject to be established by that and that property is not excluded from the similar instance.

original: bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dod pas gzhan pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid de bsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dod pas gzhan pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid de bsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the opponent himself, by his very desire to establish it, admits it.

original: de'i phyir / de'i chas khyab pa zhes brjod pa rang gi bsgrub pa bya ba dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan las gzhan du mi rigs par brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de'i chas khyab pa zhes brjod pa rang gi bsgrub pa bya ba dang / med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan las gzhan du mi rigs par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the pervasion by that is the relation of the probandum and the probans, and it is not right to say that it is a reason of the relation of invariable concomitance.

original: gdon mi za bar gzhan la mi 'jug pas 'phangs so zhes ji ltar dogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar gzhan la mi 'jug pas 'phangs so zhes ji ltar dogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that there is the doubt that it is necessarily projected to another?

original: bden te / gtan tshigs thams cad phyogs su byas pa kho na'i chos can la rang gi bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa tshad mas nges par nus na ni 'dis dogs par mi bya ste /
analyzed: bden te / gtan tshigs thams cad phyogs su byas pa kho na'i chos can la rang gi bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa tshad mas nges par nus na ni 'dis dogs par mi bya ste /
translated: It is true, but if it is possible to ascertain by means of a valid cognition the relation of the probandum and the probans in the subject that is taken as the position of all reasons, then one should not doubt this.

original: dper na yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni skad cig ma bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid las bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma mjug pa bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni skad cig ma bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid las bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma mjug pa bzhin du /
translated: For example, it is like the reason of the nature of the characteristic of existence, which is able to prove the probandum of momentariness, and the valid cognition that contradicts the opposite of the nature of the probandum.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshig ni phyogs su byas pa'i chos can dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig gi 'brel pa ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pas sgrub na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshig ni phyogs su byas pa'i chos can dang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig gi 'brel pa ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pas sgrub na /
translated: The reason of effect is a reason of nature in some cases, and the relation between the subject and the reason is established by perception and non-apprehension.

original: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i bsgrub pa'i bya ba'i chos gzung bar bya ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i bsgrub pa'i bya ba'i chos gzung bar bya ba yin /
translated: How can it be a property to be proven that is hidden?

original: de'i phyir gzhan la rab tu grub pa de las yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan la rab tu grub pa de las yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is established for others.

original: de la ltos pas gzhan la mi 'jug pas thun mong ma yin pa srid par @191a * //🔽dogs pas de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang bzlog pa gzhan dag la 'jug pa ma nges pa ni de gnyi ga las /
analyzed: de la ltos pas gzhan la mi 'jug pas thun mong ma yin pa srid par @191a * // dogs pas de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang bzlog pa gzhan dag la 'jug pa ma nges pa ni de gnyi ga las /
translated: Since it does not engage others by relying on that, it is possible that it is not shared.🔽Since there is doubt, that is ascertained from both of those.

original: de'i chos can phyi rol du gyur ba mi rigs pas ma nges pa dang / bsgrub bar bya ba la 'jug pa dang rnam par gcod pa dag gis thams cad bsdus pas gtan tshigs de la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i chos can phyi rol du gyur ba mi rigs pas ma nges pa dang / bsgrub bar bya ba la 'jug pa dang rnam par gcod pa dag gis thams cad bsdus pas gtan tshigs de la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is not reasonable for the subject to be external to that, it is uncertain. Since all are included by engaging and excluding the probandum, there is doubt about that reason.

original: la lar sngar rten la yod par bzung ba brjed pa la 'brel pa sgrub pa'i tshad mas dran pa ni gzhan la 'jug pa la ltos pa yin snyam sems nas 'di dag gi lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: la lar sngar rten la yod par bzung ba brjed pa la 'brel pa sgrub pa'i tshad mas dran pa ni gzhan la 'jug pa la ltos pa yin snyam sems nas 'di dag gi lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To respond to this, the root text states, “It is not that there is no engagement of another.”

original: gzhan la mi 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la mi 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Why is it not the case that there is no engagement of another?

original: ga las she na ma 'brel pa ni 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ga las she na ma 'brel pa ni 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: Because the relation is not a relation of nonconnection.

original: rnam par gcod pas bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir yin gyi phyogs ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas bye brag tu byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pas bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir yin gyi phyogs ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas bye brag tu byas pa ma yin no //
translated: The distinction is made by the exclusion of the property of the subject, not by the exclusion of the property of another.

original: de lta na yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yang chos can la chos yod par gang la the tshom za ba de la ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i rigs pa thob pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de lta na yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yang chos can la chos yod par gang la the tshom za ba de la ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i rigs pa thob pa'i phyir te /
translated: Even so, the exclusion of nonconnection is also obtained by the exclusion of the property of the subject, because the doubt as to whether the property exists in the subject is eliminated.

original: dper na nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the statement, “Nāgārjuna is a master of archery.”

original: nag pa 'phong skyen pa ci yod dam med ces the tshom za ba de'i phyir nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba de la yod par ston par byed pa thos nas phyogs gzhan yod par gyur pa nyan pa po dogs par rnam par gnas pa bsal ba'i
analyzed: nag pa 'phong skyen pa ci yod dam med ces the tshom za ba de'i phyir nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba de la yod par ston par byed pa thos nas phyogs gzhan yod par gyur pa nyan pa po dogs par rnam par gnas pa bsal ba'i
translated: Because of the doubt, Is there any skill in archery or not? in order to eliminate the listener's doubt that there is another topic, the statement Naga is skilled in archery is made.

original: phyir ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i rigs pa 'dir thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa'i rigs pa 'dir thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the reason that excludes what is not related is obtained.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i rnam par gcod pa bsal bar 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i rnam par gcod pa bsal bar 'dod pa ni /
translated: The desire to eliminate the exclusion of the other's assertion is

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te gzhan la rjes su mi 'jug pas thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽'dir yang dpe ni dper na /
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te gzhan la rjes su mi 'jug pas thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro // 'dir yang dpe ni dper na /
translated: stated as not distinguished by the exclusion of what is possessed by another, which is connected to not shared by not engaging with another.

original: srid sgrub 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: srid sgrub 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Here, the example is like Arjuna is skilled in archery.

original: sgra mtshungs kyang 'di 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba'i sgra'i nus pas yon tan khyad par can la 'jug ste /
analyzed: sgra mtshungs kyang 'di 'phong skyen no zhes bya ba'i sgra'i nus pas yon tan khyad par can la 'jug ste /
translated: Although the words are the same, the power of the word skilled engages with a special quality.

original: srid sgrub 'phong skyen par grub pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa dogs pa med de 'di 'dra'i khyad par bcas pa gzhan la yang yod dam med ces gzhan dang ldan pa'i nyan pa po dgos pa na gang gi tshe srid sgrub 'phong skyen no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe
analyzed: srid sgrub 'phong skyen par grub pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa dogs pa med de 'di 'dra'i khyad par bcas pa gzhan la yang yod dam med ces gzhan dang ldan pa'i nyan pa po dgos pa na gang gi tshe srid sgrub 'phong skyen no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe
translated: When one says “Arjuna is skilled in archery,”

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i rigs pa 'thob po //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i rigs pa 'thob po //
translated: at that time, the reasoning that excludes possession of other is obtained.

original: bstan par bya ba la the tshom gnas pa'i phyogs dag phan tshun mi mthun pa'i phyir gcig la bstan pa @191b des gzhan rnam par bcad par rigs pa'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba la the tshom gnas pa'i phyogs dag phan tshun mi mthun pa'i phyir gcig la bstan pa @191b des gzhan rnam par bcad par rigs pa'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the positions that doubt the object to be indicated are mutually contradictory, it is reasonable that the indication of one excludes the others by the power of reasoning.

original: de 'dir phyogs la chos 'di yod dam med ces dogs pa la phyogs kyi chos zhes de la yod pa nyid bstan pa'i ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de 'dir phyogs la chos 'di yod dam med ces dogs pa la phyogs kyi chos zhes de la yod pa nyid bstan pa'i ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin gyi /
translated: Here, when there is doubt about whether this property exists in the position or not, the non-connection of indicating its existence there is excluded by the term “property of the position.”

original: gzhan dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not possession of other.

original: de'i chos khyab pa'i de bstan pas na de la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i cha ni de'i chos so //
analyzed: de'i chos khyab pa'i de bstan pas na de la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i cha ni de'i chos so //
translated: Therefore, it is thought that doubt arises about that when its property is shown.

original: de'i sgras ni phyogs khyad par du byed kyi chos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i sgras ni phyogs khyad par du byed kyi chos ni ma yin te /
translated: The word “that” specifies the subject, but not the property.

original: chos la chos rten pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos la chos rten pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for a property to be based on a property.

original: cha ni chos la bya'i phyogs gcig ma yin te /
analyzed: cha ni chos la bya'i phyogs gcig ma yin te /
translated: The part is called a property, not a part.

original: phyogs kyi sgra chos can tsam brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgra chos can tsam brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the word “subject” expresses only the subject.

original: de'i cha ni cha shas ma yin te phyogs gcig med pa'i phyir ro //🔽phyogs kyi chos la yod pa de'i khyab pa ni gang khyab par bya ba dang / gang khyab par byed pa de gnyi ga'i chos su rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i cha ni cha shas ma yin te phyogs gcig med pa'i phyir ro // phyogs kyi chos la yod pa de'i khyab pa ni gang khyab par bya ba dang / gang khyab par byed pa de gnyi ga'i chos su rtogs pa yin te /
translated: The part is not a part, because it does not have a part.🔽The pervasion of the property of the subject is understood as the property of both that which is pervaded and that which pervades.

original: gang gi tshe khyab par byed pa brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe khyab par byed par go bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe khyab par byed pa brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe khyab par byed par go bar bya'o //
translated: When the pervader is stated, then the pervaded is understood.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i 'dun pa'i don gtso bo yin gyi 'dir nges par gzung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i 'dun pa'i don gtso bo yin gyi 'dir nges par gzung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: “That” has the primary meaning of existence, but here it is not a definite determinative.

original: chos la chos mi rten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos la chos mi rten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the property is not based on the property-possessor.

original: des na 'di'i don ni de la khyab pa ni chos can gang la khyab par bya ba yod pa de la khyab par byed pa yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: des na 'di'i don ni de la khyab pa ni chos can gang la khyab par bya ba yod pa de la khyab par byed pa yod pa kho na ste /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of this is as follows: The pervasion is that wherever the property to be pervaded exists, only there does the pervader exist.

original: bdag nyid du gyur pa'i chos kyis khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid du gyur pa'i chos kyis khyab pa yin no //
translated: The property that is the nature of the property-possessor is the pervasion.

original: de yang khyab par bya ba yod pa la ltos nas khyab par byed pa kho na'i khyab par rtogs so //
analyzed: de yang khyab par bya ba yod pa la ltos nas khyab par byed pa kho na'i khyab par rtogs so //
translated: Moreover, the pervasion is understood only in terms of the existence of the pervader in dependence on the existence of the property to be pervaded.

original: de bzhin du nges bzung gis khyab par byed pa kho na de la yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du nges bzung gis khyab par byed pa kho na de la yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, the pervader is not ascertained to exist there alone,

original: gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur bas khyab par byed pa ma yin pa lus can nyid la sogs pa de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs med par thal bar 'gyur bas khyab par byed pa ma yin pa lus can nyid la sogs pa de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there would be no reason, since the pervader, such as corporeality, exists.

original: de kho na la yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de kho na la yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor does it exist there alone,

original: rtsol ba las byung ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / thun mong gi gtan tshigs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / thun mong gi gtan tshigs su 'gyur te /
translated: because it would follow that exertion and so on would not be reasons, and that a common reason would exist.

original: gzhal bya la sogs pa nyid mi rtag pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal bya la sogs pa nyid mi rtag pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of cognition and so on exist in impermanence.

original: gang gi tshe khyab par bya ba'i chos brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe khyab par bya ba'i go bar byed pa ni khyab par byed pa de kho na la yod pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe khyab par bya ba'i chos brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe khyab par bya ba'i go bar byed pa ni khyab par byed pa de kho na la yod pa'o //
translated: When one wishes to state the pervaded property, then the indicator of the pervaded is that which exists only in the pervader.

original: chos can gang la khyab par byed pa yod pa de kho na la yod pa na de med du zin kyang khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can gang la khyab par byed pa yod pa de kho na la yod pa na de med du zin kyang khyab pa yin no //
translated: When it exists only in the subject of the property that has the pervader, then even if it does not exist, it is the pervasion.

original: 'di yang khyab par bya ba kho na de la yod pa zhes nges par bzung ba ni gtan tshigs med pa thal bar 'gyur bas brten par mi bya ste /🔽khyab par bya ba ma yin pa yang yod pa'i @192a * //
analyzed: 'di yang khyab par bya ba kho na de la yod pa zhes nges par bzung ba ni gtan tshigs med pa thal bar 'gyur bas brten par mi bya ste / khyab par bya ba ma yin pa yang yod pa'i @192a * //
translated: Also, when it is ascertained that the pervaded exists only in that, then because the consequence of the absence of a reason would follow, it should not be relied upon.

original: pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the non-pervaded also exists.

original: khyab par bya ba ni de la yod pa kho na yang ma yin te //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba ni de la yod pa kho na yang ma yin te //
translated: The pervaded does not exist only in that.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ba dang thun mong ba gtan tshigs su 'gyur te //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur ba dang thun mong ba gtan tshigs su 'gyur te //
translated: If it existed only in the similar class, it would not be a reason, and if it were common, it would be a reason.

original: gzhal bya ni rtag pa rnams la gdon mi za bar yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal bya ni rtag pa rnams la gdon mi za bar yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of apprehension is necessarily existent in permanent things.

original: khyab par bya ba dang // khyab par byed par brjod pa'i khyab pa ni gnyi ga la chos mtshungs pas gcig tu rtogs na ni ldan pa la sogs pa gzhan du ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i phyir bstan to //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dang // khyab par byed par brjod pa'i khyab pa ni gnyi ga la chos mtshungs pas gcig tu rtogs na ni ldan pa la sogs pa gzhan du ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i phyir bstan to //
translated: The pervasion that is expressed by the pervaded and the pervader is taught in order to understand both as the same property, so that conjunction and so on do not become otherwise.

original: 'di ltar sngar mi ldan par rnam par bcad pas nges par bzung nas phyis gzhan dang ldan pa'i rnam par gcod pa yin na gnyi ga la rnam pa gcig gis khyab po zhes bya ba las yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngar mi ldan par rnam par bcad pas nges par bzung nas phyis gzhan dang ldan pa'i rnam par gcod pa yin na gnyi ga la rnam pa gcig gis khyab po zhes bya ba las yin /
translated: Thus, having previously ascertained the exclusion of non-conjoined, later there is the exclusion of conjunction with another, from the statement that both are pervaded by one aspect.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The sign exists in the possessor of the sign,

original: rtags la rtags can yod nyid dang // cig shos rtags can kho na la'o //
analyzed: rtags la rtags can yod nyid dang // cig shos rtags can kho na la'o //
translated: and the other is only in the possessor of the sign.

original: nges pa las ni bzlog pa la //
analyzed: nges pa las ni bzlog pa la //
translated: From ascertainment, there is the opposite,

original: rtags dang rtags can 'brel pa med //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can 'brel pa med //
translated: the absence of the connection between the sign and the possessor of the sign.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: des na slob dpon gyis ldan pa'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa gzhan dag la nyes pa brjod do //
analyzed: des na slob dpon gyis ldan pa'i stobs kyis go bar byed pa gzhan dag la nyes pa brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the master states the fault in other means of understanding by the power of conjunction.

original: ldan yin me dang du ba na //
analyzed: ldan yin me dang du ba na //
translated: Fire and smoke are related.

original: cha 'ga' zhig gis ma yin te //🔽du ba des ni thams cad kyi //
analyzed: cha 'ga' zhig gis ma yin te // du ba des ni thams cad kyi //
translated: But not by a part of one and a part of the other,

original: gsal byed thob par 'gyur phyir te //
analyzed: gsal byed thob par 'gyur phyir te //
translated: because the smoke makes known the whole of the fire.🔽But it is not the case that the fire makes known the whole of the smoke.

original: 'di la 'jug pa ma yin no //🔽zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'di la 'jug pa ma yin no // zhes bshad do //
translated: This is not the case.

original: 'di ltar ldan pa ni gnyi ga la khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur bas khyab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar ldan pa ni gnyi ga la khyad par med par thal bar 'gyur bas khyab pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the relation is not pervasion, because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no difference between the two.

original: khyab par byed pa'i chos kyis khyab pa ci 'dra ba khyab par bya ba chos de 'dra ba ni ma yin no snyam nas /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa'i chos kyis khyab pa ci 'dra ba khyab par bya ba chos de 'dra ba ni ma yin no snyam nas /
translated: The pervaded property is not the same as the pervader.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gang tshe 'brel pa gnyis la gnas //
analyzed: gang tshe 'brel pa gnyis la gnas //
translated: When the relation is based on the two,

original: rtags dang rtags can lhan cig ste //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can lhan cig ste //
translated: the sign and the possession of the sign are simultaneous,

original: rten dang brten pa'i yod pa bzhin //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i yod pa bzhin //
translated: like the existence of the supported and the support.

original: ldan pa la ni de med do //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ldan pa la ni de med do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: But this is not the case with the relation.

original: des na khyab par byed pa ni khyab par bya ba ma yin la khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na khyab par byed pa ni khyab par bya ba ma yin la khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the pervader is not the pervaded, nor is the pervaded the pervader.

original: de'i chas khyab pa ni gtan tshigs zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa ni gtan tshigs zhes brjod pas /
translated: Since it is said that the reason is the pervasion by a part of it,

original: ldan pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ba dang gnyi ga go bar bya ba dang go bar byed par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldan pa'i phyogs brjod pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ba dang gnyi ga go bar bya ba dang go bar byed par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and there would be no fault of stating the position of the pervasion, and it would not follow that both the subject and the reason would be the object of understanding and the means of understanding.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi khyab par byed pa ni go bar bya bar rtogs la khyab par bya ba ni go byed du rtogs so //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyi khyab par byed pa ni go bar bya bar rtogs la khyab par bya ba ni go byed du rtogs so //
translated: The pervasion of the definition of the reason as it has been explained is understood as the object of understanding, and the pervaded is understood as the means of understanding.

original: gal te de lta na phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba de tsam gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin pa de'i phyir phyogs kyi chos dang de'i chas @192b khyab pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi tshul gnyis su 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te de lta na phyogs chos de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba de tsam gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin pa de'i phyir phyogs kyi chos dang de'i chas @192b khyab pa zhes bya ba gtan tshigs kyi tshul gnyis su 'gyur la /
translated: If that is so, then since the mere statement “the property of the subject that is pervaded by a part of it” is the definition of the reason, there would be two modes of the reason: the property of the subject and pervaded by a part of it.

original: gzhan du tshul gsum du bshad pa dang ji ltar 'gal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du tshul gsum du bshad pa dang ji ltar 'gal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: And how could this not contradict the explanation of the three modes elsewhere?

original: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag bshad par rig par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag bshad par rig par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The statement “pervaded by a part of it” should be understood as referring to the forward and reverse pervasions.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi tshul nyid kyis khyab pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi tshul nyid kyis khyab pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because pervasion exists by the very method of concomitance and reverse pervasion.

original: 'di ltar gang kho na'i rjes su 'gro ba dang gang ldog na ldog pa de nyid des khyab par brjod de de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir na khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang kho na'i rjes su 'gro ba dang gang ldog na ldog pa de nyid des khyab par brjod de de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir na khyab pa yin no //
translated: Thus, that which is concomitant with just that and that which is reversed when it is reversed is pervaded by just that, because it is of the nature of that.

original: khyab pa brjod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa brjod de /
analyzed: khyab pa brjod pas rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa brjod de /
translated: By stating the pervasion, concomitance and reverse pervasion are stated.

original: de'i phyir khyab pa'i tshig gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pas 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab pa'i tshig gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pas 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in stating concomitance and reverse pervasion by the words of pervasion.

original: des na shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas nas nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas nas nges pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is ascertained by the power of the reason that causes understanding.

original: nges pa yang tshad ma du ma kho nas sam yang na bdag nyid ji lta ba gang dang gang gi tshad ma des nges ba ste /
analyzed: nges pa yang tshad ma du ma kho nas sam yang na bdag nyid ji lta ba gang dang gang gi tshad ma des nges ba ste /
translated: And ascertainment is by many valid cognitions alone, or by whatever valid cognition is appropriate to oneself.

original: tshad ma gang dang gang yin pa de ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad ma gang dang gang yin pa de ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
translated: Whatever valid cognition it is, that will be explained later.

original: 'am gyi sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni don mtshungs par bstan gyi tshig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'am gyi sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni don mtshungs par bstan gyi tshig ni ma yin no //
